title: Marine Planning: Team changes and recruitment

content.text: We are excited to welcome three new team members to Marine Planning since our last update:
Additionally, we bid a temporary farewell to David Spray, who is taking a sabbatical to pursue an MPhil in Environmental Policy. We look forward to his return in August 2025.
If you share our passion for the marine environment and are interested in joining the MMO, explore our current opportunities on Civil Service Jobs.
